posts.post_title: Prices Reduced 2/11 - T3 Turkey Reds - Wallace, Schulte, Carrigan, Bransfield, more
posts.post_content:
Have for sale the following SGC graded T3 Turkey Reds.  A couple scans are shown below.  The rest can be accessed by clicking on the front/back links or clicking [URL="http://s1065.photobucket.com/user/x2drich2000/library/ebay/PRE-WAR/t3"]here[/URL] to see all.  If any links don't work, please let me know.

Prices include delivery in US. Payment - check, postal money order, or Paypal friends & family. Regular Paypal, add an additional 3% to cover the fees. First to commit to purchase gets the card.  Any questions, please let me know. 

Thanks
DJ
[url]x2drich2000@yahoo.com[/url]
